dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5194 IH: Yanking Outlays for an Unethical, Ruthless Enterprise that Fraudulently Impedes Robust Electoral Debate Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ogles (for himself, Mr. Crane, and Mr. Mooney) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prohibit Federal funds from being used to pay the salary of John Luman Smith.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Yanking Outlays for an Unethical, Ruthless Enterprise that Fraudulently Impedes Robust Electoral Debate Act or the YOUâ€™RE FIRED Act.

section.header: Prohibition on funding to provide a salary to John Luman Smith
section.text: No Federal funds may be used to provide a salary for John Luman Smith, Special Counsel for the Department of Justice.
